Package net.sourceforge.jiu.color.analysis

Contains classes that analyze pixel or sample values and thus determine certain image properties

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Histogram1DCreator This class creates one-dimensional histograms for images with integer samples.
Histogram3DCreator This class creates three-dimensional histograms for images with integer samples.
MatrixCreator This class creates and initializes co-occurrence matrices and co-occurrence frequency matrices.
MeanDifference This operation determines the mean difference between two images.
TextureAnalysis This class determines a number of properties for a given co-occurrence matrix.
 

Package net.sourceforge.jiu.color.analysis Description

Contains classes that analyze pixel or sample values and thus determine certain image properties.
